Docs.param: The name of the resource group to delete. The name is case insensitive.

The headers that will be added to request.
The cancellation token.
Docs.remarks: When you delete a resource group, all of its resources are also deleted. Deleting a resource group deletes all of its template deployments and currently stored operations.
